message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value to you, I propose an initial price of $750,000. This is a special offer considering the high demand and limited availability of the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I recognize the value of the product, I'm aiming for a price point closer to $650,000. This considers my budget constraints and ensures a mutually beneficial deal.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $700,000. This price reflects a compromise between our initial positions and aims to ensure both parties are satisfied with the transaction.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to find a middle ground.  To be completely transparent, $675,000 is the highest I'm able to go while staying within my budget. I believe this offer represents a fair compromise for both of us.

I see your position, Bob. Considering the ongoing dialogue and the value you place on the product, I am prepared to offer $690,000. This price aims to bridge the gap between our offers and provides a satisfactory outcome for both parties.
